system.description: Effect: Before using Rollout, the user may freely attack up to half of the Movement Score of their choice. The user gains @Affliction[choice-locked] 4. While @Affliction[choice-locked], the user does not consume PP. Each successive use of Rollout increases Rollout’s Power by 30, and Rollout's Power is reset to 30 if it misses or there is not a valid target.

actions.name: Rollout

Each successive use of Rollout increases Rollout’s Power by 30, and Rollout's Power is reset to 30 if it misses or there is not a valid target.
